content.text: The Tactical Military Watchband Cover Protects in Harsh Conditions Many of the watches and smartwatches on the market today are capable of withstanding bumps and scraps but will show the scars from an active lifestyle , so the Tactical Military Watchband Cover has been created to eliminate this occurrence . Working with your choice of smartwatch , fitness tracker or watch the cover strap works to offer durable protection from damage at all times when hiking , exploring or partaking in sport . The Velcro design will keep the unit secure at all times , while also offering simple access for wearers to appreciate . The Tactical Military Watchband Cover is made and available for purchase from Etsy retailer TACMonsterWatchbands and comes in several color options with space for your choice of Morale Patches .
